doc:
Ruth Shepley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ruth_Shepley 0 Ruth Shepley (May 29, 1892 - October 16, 1951) was an American stage actress from Providence, Rhode Island who appeared in comedies such as It Pays to Advertise (1914). A Broadway performer, she was trim, with blonde hair, and medium height. She was educated in Paris. Shepley was a close friend of Helen Hayes and Douglas Fairbanks Sr.. Ruth_Shepley ( May_29_,_1892 - October_16_,_1951 ) was an_American_stage_actress from Providence , Rhode_Island who appeared in comedies such as It Pays_to_Advertise ( 1914 ) . A_Broadway_performer , she was trim , with blonde_hair , and medium_height . She was_educated in Paris . Shepley was a_close_friend of Helen_Hayes and Douglas_Fairbanks_Sr . .
